item.description:
Webinar of Our Boston IBD Main Meeting


First, read the announcement of the live Boston IBD Main Meeting. It is here.

Thanks to Jeff’s effort our Wednesday meeting will be available as a webinar. This is our second effort, but you will be able to view the full meeting remotely. We need people to try it out and give us feedback on making it better.


These are the instructions for Wednesday, February 25, to participate:
  • RSVP to this announcement on this page. This helps us know how many are participating remotely.
  • Join the Google Group BostonInvestorsVideo.
  • At 7:00 PM on Wednesday 2/25, open a browser and go to http://orrik.glance.n...
  • Type in the access code, which will be sent to everyone who RSVPs.
  • Call the conference line at 1-605-475-4323 and punch in the access code when prompted. Long distance charges apply to this call. Again, this access code will be provided to everyone who RSVPs.
  • Post your live comments and questions on BostonInvestorsVideo. Someone in the meeting will ask your question.
  • Enjoy. Learn. Be forgiving for this effort’s failings. We are working on improving.
  • Post feedback on our Google Group BostonInvestorsVideo.




We need help to make this happen:
  • We must have two cell phones at the meeting with unlimited minutes for long-distance to provide the audio to the webinar service. Neither my phone nor Jeff’s phone has this feature.
  • We need someone in the studio audience to raise their hand to ask remote audience questions, as they appear on the BostonInvestorsVideo Google Group. This person must have a computer and be hooked into the internet while monitoring the webinar audience interaction.
  • We are spending some money to make this happen so if you would send money to me at Doug Roberts, 43A Riverside Farm Drive, Lee, NH 03861. We anticipate some expenses for software, hardware, webinar service and phone service.
  • If you are an accountant, or just a reliable bill payer, and would track and disburse these small funds, please email me to volunteer.
  • If you would help improve the service, join our video Google Group called BostonInvestorsVideo. We need help.


Free would be nice
We are not trying to become a profit making organization. We just want to offer live meetings at the very lowest possible cost. Free would be nice.
item.name: Boston IBD Main Meeting Webinar
